his target and shoot with a high level of energy, attemping destroy

-- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::Hot Rod::
> 
> He hears a transmission on his comm. He opens a comm on Maximal
> channels.
> "Any Maximal recieving this, this is Hot Rod! I'm attempting to 
escape
> the Alliance base. I'm in the ocean off their island. I'm being 
followed
> by several troops. I need asistance. I repeat, I need asistance. 
This is
> a back up request! And you better get here fast, or you'll have one 
dead
> Maximal."
